message: Starting review of Phase 2: Implementation - checking phase handover and agent deliverables
Analyzing Phase 2 findings - found critical SQL errors. Now verifying actual state of files.
Verified agents table schema uses started_at (not created_at). SQL query in get_agents_for_task already uses correct column. Checking if SQL error was fixed.
Completed code review. SQL error was fixed. SQLite-first pattern implemented with JSON fallback. Preparing verdict.

Review completed. Verdict: APPROVED. Phase 2 Implementation meets all success criteria: SQLite-first pattern in agents.py and phases.py, critical SQL error fixed, all state_db helper functions present.
